mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T1.SYS_NM) AS NO, T1.SYS_NM, T1.TYPE, T1.DB_NM, T1.IP, T1.PORT, T1.USER_ID, T1.USER_PW, T1.LT_WK_DTTI, (SELECT S1.USER_NM FROM webadmin.TB_MT_CO_USER S1 WHERE S1.USER_ID= T1.LT_WK_PRSN ) AS LT_WK_PRSN FROM webadmin.tb_mt_co_svrinfo T1 WHERE T1.SYS_NM LIKE #{sys_nm} AND T1.TYPE LIKE #{type} AND T1.IP LIKE #{ip} ) T2

SELECT T1.SYS_NM, T1.TYPE, T1.DB_NM, T1.IP, T1.PORT, T1.USER_ID, T1.USER_PW, T1.LT_WK_DTTI, (SELECT S1.USER_NM FROM webadmin.TB_MT_CO_USER S1 WHERE S1.USER_ID= T1.LT_WK_PRSN ) AS LT_WK_PRSN FROM webadmin.tb_mt_co_svrinfo T1 WHERE T1.SYS_NM = #{sys_nm}
mapper.update: UPDATE webadmin.tb_mt_co_svrinfo SET type=#{type}, PORT=#{port}, IP=#{ip}, user_id = #{user_id}, user_pw = #{user_pw}, LT_WK_DTTI = TO_CHAR(now(),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), LT_WK_PRSN = #{lt_wk_prsn} WHERE SYS_NM = #{sys_nm}
mapper.select: select 'Y' as SYS_MNT_CD, '미사용' SYS_MNT_CD_NM union all select 'N' as SYS_MNT_CD, '사용' SYS_MNT_CD_NM
select * from webadmin.tb_mt_co_properties order by propertie_key
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO webadmin.tb_mt_co_properties (propertie_key, propertie_value, propertie_description) VALUES (#{propertie_key}, #{propertie_value}, #{propertie_description});
